title: Chinna Sirusugal Lyrics Kunguma Poovum Konjum Puravum
stanzas:
putham pudhusaaga
nenappugal posu posunu
pattu pookkal pookka

podhuvaakka paruvam oru
poondhottam aachu
nee.. pazhakam oru
neerottam aachu
vilagaadha uravu oru
kondaattam aachu

putham pudhusaaga
nenappugal posu posunu
pattu pookkal pookka

Chinna sirusugal
manasukkul silu silunu
chinna thooral poda

sidu moonji neethaan endru
solli solli
killi killu
chinna chinna saettai
seidhenaa..ohh ho..

sandhu pondhil
neethaan vandhaa
othipoga oththukkaama
sandiyar pol vambu
seidhen naan. oh ho..

ara drawer potta
paiyyan padaadha dhawani
viral sooppi ninna
pulla nee pottaachu
dhawani

vilayaattaa irundha mugam
yaen velirii pochu
verenna poopu adanja
veveram therinjaachu

kurumbattam thirinja ponnu
yaen kumari aachu.
verenna udambu unakku
valangu mudivaachu..

mannaalathaan veedu katti
naanum neeyum vaazhurappo
meen kuzhambu aakki potta nee

kamarukatti kadala muttai
vaai vachi kaakkaa kadi
kadichi thandhaai nee

karuvaatta pola
theeyila en nenja
vaatina
angaala amman koyilil
kanjaada nee kaattina

adi aathi manasukula
poo vachi paarthu
veraaga aadi aasaiyum
azhagu mani theru

adi aathi nenapukull
poi ninnathaaru
veraaru poocham vidutha
neecham maram poovu..

Chinna sirusugal
manasukkul silu silunu
chinna thooral poda

putham pudhusaaga
nenappugal posu posunu
pattu pookkal pookka
category: Song:Chinna Sirusugal - Kunguma Poovum Konjum Puravum

seo.title: Chinna Sirusugal Lyrics Kunguma Poovum Konjum Puravum
seo.description: Get the complete Chinna Sirusugal Lyrics Kunguma Poovum Konjum Puravum from Kunguma Poovum Konjum Puravum. Read the lyrics penned by Vaali and composed by Yuvan and sung by Bella Shinde. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vaali, Kunguma Poovum Konjum Puravum, Yuvan, Bella Shinde, Javed Ali, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
